Alphah/Nightstrike/Khonkolor:

Nightstrike grabbedd Alphah in that way that he used her as shield 
while he aimed with the dart-gun. Alphah was pale and she tried to 
free herself but she couldn't. 

Khonkolor arrived at the room and said "By all cats, what's going on 
here???"

Finally, Nightstrike open fire against Xenofonte Force, Pegatron, 
Epyon, Skyburst and Khonkolor.

THe dart stuck against Khonkolor who tottered and started to feel 
sleep.

OOC: The darts has a sedative that will dop the bots sleep in alarge 
while 



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "black_ben14" <black_ben14@h...> wrote:
> The Xenoforce as entered the base guided by Pegatron.
> Pegatron:So that's the base I...
> Then he saw Nightstrike taking Alpha in hostage.
> Pegatron:What?Leave her alone damn bastard!If you want a fight come 
> and get me!
> And he take out his saber katana.
>
